contentrichtext.text: '''Vorkosigan''' is an important surname in [[Lois McMaster Bujold]]'s [[science fiction]] series, the '''[[Vorkosigan Saga]]'''. ''Vorkosigan'' can refer to: *[[Aral Vorkosigan]] – Former Lord Regent of [[Barrayar]] *[[Miles Vorkosigan]] – Aral Vorkosigan's son and the main character of most of the series *[[Count Piotr Vorkosigan|Piotr Vorkosigan]] – Father of Aral, grandfather to Miles. *[[Mark Vorkosigan]] – Miles's clone brother Additionally, the following characters, each married to one of the above, are either Lady or Countess Vorkosigan, depending on the time. *[[Cordelia Naismith]] – Aral's second wife, Miles's mother of [[Beta Colony|Betan]] birth. *[[Ekaterin Vorsoisson]] – Eventually, Miles's wife *Olivia [[Vorbarra]] – Piotr's wife, Aral's mother, daughter of Prince Xav Vorbarra {{Bujold|vorkosigan}} {{disambig}}
